Description:
Find information about network devices that is not stored in config files

Author: Austin Clark
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Cisco Discovery
Query: sourcetype='cisco-aaa' eql select * from _source_ where Query('dir OR show arp OR show cdp OR show clock OR show ip interface OR show ip route OR show ip sockets OR show processes OR show ssh OR show users OR show version')
